member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfSchedule.XForms.MonthViewSettings.AppointmentDisplayCount
member.summary: The AppointmentDisplayCount property is used to define the maximum number of the appointment to be displayed in a month cell. This is a bindable property.
member.value: This property takes the value. For AppointmentDisplayCount value is 1 and month cell have more than 1 appointments, single appointment will be displayed and remaining appointments in month cell displayed in more appointments count. If an AppointmentDisplayCount value is more than one, for an example value is 3 and month cell have more than 3 appointments, 2 appointments will be displayed and remaining appointments in month cell displayed in more appointments count.
member.remarks: It will be applicable only for Xamarin.Forms.UWP desktop month view while AppointmentDisplayMode as Appointment.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfSchedule.XForms.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Provides classes and interfaces to create which enable a user to interact with . The classes allow a user to create and manipulate the appointments in different views and performs the operations like swiping, rescheduling appointments through drag and drop, date restriction and customization.
